JLutils 1.16.0
  • Reference

Chi-squared residuals matrix plot

Source: R/ggchisq_res.R
ggchisq_res.Rd

Chi-squared residuals matrix plot

ggchisq_res(formula, data, weight = NULL, addNA = FALSE,
  label = NULL, breaks = c(-4, -2, 2, 4), palette = "RdBu",
  return_data = FALSE)

Arguments

formula

formula of variables to be cross-tabulated, rows on left hand side and columns on the right hand side
data

data frame containing the data
weight

optionnal string indicating a column containing weights
addNA

whether to include NA values in the tables
label

optionnal cell labels (see examples)
breaks

how to recode residuals into categories?
palette

Brewer colour palette (see http://colorbrewer2.org)
return_data

return computed data.frame instead of ggplot?

Value

a ggplot graphic or a data frame if return_data == TRUE.

Examples

ggchisq_res(
  Sex + Age + Class ~ Survived,
  data = as.data.frame(Titanic),
  weight = "Freq")
ggchisq_res(
  Sex + Age + Class ~ Survived,
  data = as.data.frame(Titanic),
  weight = "Freq",
  return_data = TRUE)

ggchisq_res(
  Sex + Age + Class ~ Survived,
  data = as.data.frame(Titanic),
  weight = "Freq",
  label = "scales::percent(row.prop)")
ggchisq_res(
  Sex + Age + Class ~ Survived,
  data = as.data.frame(Titanic),
  weight = "Freq",
  breaks = c(-4, -2, 0, 2, 4))
